title: Odyssey onslaught missions
body:
Looking for people to complete onslaught with! 

In solo que for Odyssey, alot of people are trying to complete different missions.. There's lots of arguing over which one they personally want to complete and all in all it's just a hard time getting a full comp of people on the same page ultimately wasting time when someone fucks up their picks/augs and everyone just loads in and surrenders. So basically, looking for like minded people (or even links to a place to find groups for completing missions in general, like a FB group or a disc channel or whatever if there are any cause this kind of thing does happen every now and then with harder missions) to just get this shit out of the way. I also don't mind trying to help people complete their missions! It's just much easier to get through when you're all doing the one task.

I'm currently up to: 
Clear Onslaught difficulty
Clear Onslaught with all 5 as same champion
Clear Onslaught with 4 or less Augments

Just add me in game and shoot me a message if you're down. 
I also don't mind trying to help people complete their missions! It's just easier to get through when you're on the same page.
